TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit UpDownBase extends System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl
Public MustInherit Class UpDownBase Inherits ContainerControl
public ref class UpDownBase abstract : System::Windows::Forms::ContainerControl

summary.span: 实现数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）所需的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality required by a spin box (also known as an up-down control).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个数字调整框由一个文本框和一个小的垂直滚动条，通常称为数值调节钮控件组成。A spin box consists of a text box and a small vertical scroll bar, commonly referred to as a spin button control. 类链接两个控件，并允许用户更改显示在文本框中，通过单击向上或向下按钮或通过直接在文本框中输入适当的值类型。The class links the two controls and allows the user to change the display in the text box by clicking the up or down buttons or by entering the appropriate type of value directly into the text box. 使用在你想要限制的用户的值列表的情况下数字调整框可以选择，类似于列表框或组合框。Use the spin box in cases where you want to limit the list of values a user can select, similar to a list box or combo box. 根据你想要显示的类型，使用一个数字调整框的优点是列表的它允许您快速一次设置有效的值，而不是列表的添加一个项目的范围。Depending upon the type of list you want to display, the advantage to using a spin box is that it allows you to quickly set a range of valid values, rather than adding items one at a time. 派生类时，可以限制的数据类型实现一个数字调整框需要比文本框中，更少数据验证。Implementing a spin box requires less data validation than a text box, as you can limit the data type when you derive a class from . 此示例是类，该类限制为数值类型的值并使用和属性以验证数据。An example of this is the class, which limits the values to the numeric type and uses a and property to validate the data. 若要允许用户使用箭头键更改的一个数字调整框的内容，设置属性`true`。To allow the user to use the arrow keys to change the contents of a spin box, set the property to `true`. 若要限制用户对你指定的值，请设置属性`true`。To restrict the user to values you specify, set the property to `true`. 若要控制在数字显示框的文本的对齐方式，设置属性。To control the alignment of text in the spin box, set the property. 若要设置的向上和向下按钮相对于控件的文本框部分的对齐方式，设置属性为或。To set the alignment of the up and down buttons in relation to the text box portion of the control, set the property to either or . 和方法，重写时，处理单击向上或向下按钮。The and methods, when overridden, handle the clicking of the up or down buttons. 重写时，和验证方法 （不管是选择或输入） 的值并更新数字显示框中显示的文本。When overridden, the and methods validate the value (either selected or entered) and update the text displayed in the spin box. 如果值验证失败，则使用方法来选择不是有效的文本。If the value fails validation, use the method to select the text that is not valid. 这允许用户快速更正通过只需键入新值而无需手动选择或删除现有的文本的文本。This allows the user to quickly correct the text by simply typing in a new value without having to manually select or delete the existing text. 从.NET Framework 4.6，开始将基于时 app.config 文件包含以下条目系统 DPI 设置调整控件的大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, the control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类并设置其属性派生自的一些。The following code example uses the derived class and sets some of its properties derived from . 此代码，你需要具有控件名为`numericUpDown1`、 两个控件名为`comboBox1`和`comboBox2`，和三个控件名为`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在窗体上创建。This code requires that you have a control named `numericUpDown1`, two controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form. 添加到以下项`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`. 添加到以下项`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`. 可以使用代码来在运行时更改的属性值并查看每个如何影响的外观和行为的数字显示框。The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后将其命名实例`UpDownBase1`并确保与事件处理程序事件。Then name the instance `UpDownBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#380](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#380)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#380](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#380)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性创建无边框和平面控制除了默认的三维控件。You can use the property to create borderless and flat controls in addition to the default three-dimensional control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类并设置其属性派生自的一些。The following code example uses the derived class and sets some of its properties derived from . 此代码，你需要具有控件名为`numericUpDown1`、 两个控件名为`comboBox1`和`comboBox2`，和三个控件名为`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在窗体上创建。This code requires that you have a control named `numericUpDown1`, two controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form. 添加到以下项`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`. 添加到以下项`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`. 可以使用代码来在运行时更改的属性值并查看每个如何影响的外观和行为的数字显示框。The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文本属性是否由其父类内部更改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text property is being changed internally by its parent class.

value.span: 如果 属性由 类内部更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property is being changed internally by the class; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性充当标志类。The property acts as a flag for the class. 派生类使用此属性以指示当类正在更改当前属性内部。This property is used by derived classes to indicate when the class is changing the current property internally. 如果此属性设置为`false`，该控件要求用户正在更改属性并将设置属性`true`。If this property is set to `false`, the control requires that the user is changing the property and will set the property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`和数字显示框 （也称为 up-down 控件） 具有焦点，用户可以使用向上键和向下箭头键选择值。If the property is set to `true` and the spin box (also known as an up-down control) has focus, the user can use the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys to select values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类并设置其属性派生自的一些。The following code example uses the derived class and sets some of its properties derived from . 此代码，你需要具有控件名为`numericUpDown1`、 两个控件名为`comboBox1`和`comboBox2`，和三个控件名为`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在窗体上创建。This code requires that you have a control named `numericUpDown1`, two controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form. 添加到以下项`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`. 添加到以下项`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`. 可以使用代码来在运行时更改的属性值并查看每个如何影响的外观和行为的数字显示框。The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box. summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`并且用户按向上键，调用方法。If the property is set to `true` and the user presses the UP ARROW key, the method is called. 同样，如果用户按向下箭头键，调用方法。Likewise, if the user presses the DOWN ARROW key, the method is called. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

.property instance int32 PreferredHeight
Public ReadOnly Property PreferredHeight As Integer

summary.span: 获取数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）的高度。

span.span: Gets the height of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).

value.span: 数字显示框的高度，以像素为单位。

span.span: The height, in pixels, of the spin box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值根据的控件的文本框部分的属性和调整边框的样式。The property value is based on the property of the text box portion of the control and is adjusted for the style of border. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类并设置其属性派生自的一些。The following code example uses the derived class and sets some of its properties derived from . 此代码，你需要具有控件、 两个控件和三个控件在窗体上创建。This code requires that you have a control, two controls, and three controls created on a form. 标签控件和。Label the controls and . 标签控件， ，和。Label the controls , , and . 可以使用代码来在运行时更改的属性值并查看每个如何影响的外观和行为的数字显示框。The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box. 将以下项添加到组合框标记为 BorderStyle: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。Add the following items to the combo box labeled BorderStyle: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`. 将以下项添加到组合框标记为 TextAlign: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。Add the following items to the combo box labeled TextAlign: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`. [!code-cpp[Classic UpDownBase.BorderStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase.BorderStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UpDownBase.BorderStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase.BorderStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UpDownBase.BorderStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase.BorderStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ReadOnly { get; set; }
.property instance bool ReadOnly
Public Property ReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool ReadOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否只能使用向上或向下按钮更改文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text can be changed by the use of the up or down buttons only.

value.span: 如果只能使用向上或向下按钮更改文本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the text can be changed by the use of the up or down buttons only; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置属性`true`，你就不必执行大量验证属性。By setting the property to `true`, you will eliminate the need for much validation of the property. 用户将限制为使用的向上和向下按钮更改值。The user will be restricted to the use of the up and down buttons to change the values. 它将只允许用户选择你指定的值。It will only allow them to select values you specify. > [!NOTE] > 在派生类中，描述的行为会略有不同。In the derived class , the behavior described is slightly different. 当设置为`true`并按下某个键，该控件将选中其中的第一个字符匹配所按的键的集合中的第一项。When is set to `true` and a key is pressed, the control selects the first item in the collection where the first character matches the key pressed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类并设置其属性派生自的一些。The following code example uses the derived class and sets some of its properties derived from . 此代码，你需要具有控件、 两个控件和三个控件在窗体上创建。This code requires that you have a control, two controls, and three controls created on a form. 标签控件和。Label the controls and . 标签控件， ，和。Label the controls , , and . 可以使用代码来在运行时更改的属性值并查看每个如何影响的外观和行为的数字显示框。The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box. 将以下项添加到组合框标记为 BorderStyle: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。Add the following items to the combo box labeled BorderStyle: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`. 将以下项添加到组合框标记为 TextAlign: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。Add the following items to the combo box labeled TextAlign: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`. [!code-cpp[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）中选择一个文本范围，该范围指定起始位置和要选择的字符数。

span.span: Selects a range of text in the spin box (also known as an up-down control) specifying the starting position and number of characters to select.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数字显示框获得焦点，或时，可以使用方法属性未通过数据验证。The method can be used when the spin box gets focus, or when the property fails data validation. 添加的验证代码时方法在派生类中，调用方法验证失败时。When adding the validation code for the method in a derived class, call the method when validation fails. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类。The following code example uses the derived class . 此代码需要控件和已在窗体上创建和命名空间添加为引用。This code requires that a control and a have been created on a form and the namespace has been added as a reference. 上按钮的事件、 中文本的点大小控制增加。On the event for the button, the point size of text in the control increases. 这将提示控件可调整其属性，以便所有文本都均在控件中可见。This prompts the control to adjust its property so that all the text is visible in the control. 用户输入新值并离开后控制，文本是从一个字符串值转换为数字值和验证介于和值。After the user enters a new value and leaves the control, the text is converted to a numeric value from a string value and validated to be between the and values. 如果值不是有效，错误，则会显示与方法将选择的文本，以便用户可以输入新值。If the value is not valid, a is displayed with the error, and the method will select the text so the user can enter a new value. [!code-cpp[Classic UpDownBase.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase.Text Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UpDownBase.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase.Text Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UpDownBase.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase.Text Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).

value.span: 数字显示框中显示的字符串值。

span.span: The string value displayed in the spin box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用如果设置属性时属性设置为`true`。The method is called if the property is set while the property is set to `true`. 方法调用如果设置属性时属性设置为`false`。The method is called if the property is set while the property is set to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类。The following code example uses the derived class . 此代码需要控件和已在窗体上创建和命名空间添加为引用。This code requires that a control and a have been created on a form and the namespace has been added as a reference. 上按钮的事件、 中文本的点大小控制增加。On the event for the button, the point size of text in the control increases. 这将提示控件可调整其属性，以便所有文本都均在控件中可见。This prompts the control to adjust its property so all the text is visible in the control. 用户输入新值并离开后控制，文本是从一个字符串值转换为数字值和验证介于和值。After the user enters a new value and leaves the control, the text is converted to a numeric value from a string value and validated to be between the and values. 如果值不是有效，错误，则会显示与方法将选择的文本，以便用户可以输入新值。If the value is not valid, a is displayed with the error, and the method will select the text so the user can enter a new value. [!code-cpp[Classic UpDownBase.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase.Text Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UpDownBase.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase.Text Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UpDownBase.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase.Text Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）中文本的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the text in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类并设置其属性派生自的一些。The following code example uses the derived class and sets some of its properties derived from . 此代码，你需要具有控件名为`numericUpDown1`、 两个控件名为`comboBox1`和`comboBox2`，和三个控件名为`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在窗体上创建。This code requires that you have a control named `numericUpDown1`, two controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form. 添加到以下项`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`. 添加到以下项`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`. 可以使用代码来在运行时更改的属性值并查看每个如何影响的外观和行为的数字显示框。The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UpDownBase Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UpDownBase Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, handles the clicking of the up button on the spin box (also known as an up-down control).

para.span: 在重写此方法在派生类，一定要调用方法。

span.span: When overriding this method in a derived class, be sure to call the method.

para.span: 在重写此方法在派生类中的，务必要更新数字显示框的属性。

span.span: When overriding this method in a derived class, be sure to update the property of the spin box.

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类并设置其属性派生自的一些。The following code example uses the derived class and sets some of its properties derived from . 此代码，你需要具有控件名为`numericUpDown1`、 两个控件名为`comboBox1`和`comboBox2`，和三个控件名为`checkBox1`， `checkBox2`，和`checkBox2`在窗体上创建。This code requires that you have a control named `numericUpDown1`, two controls named `comboBox1` and `comboBox2`, and three controls named `checkBox1`, `checkBox2`, and `checkBox2` created on a form. 添加到以下项`comboBox1`: `None`， `Fixed3D`，和`FixedSingle`。Add the following items to `comboBox1`: `None`, `Fixed3D`, and `FixedSingle`. 添加到以下项`comboBox2`: `Left`， `Right`，和`Center`。Add the following items to `comboBox2`: `Left`, `Right`, and `Center`. 可以使用代码来在运行时更改的属性值并查看每个如何影响的外观和行为的数字显示框。The code allows you to change the property values at run time and see how each affects the appearance and behavior of the spin box. summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，验证在数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）中显示的文本。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, validates the text displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证的一些示例包括比较输入设置的数据类型在派生类中，比较的值，列表的文本或验证文本值的范围内的文本。Some examples of validation include comparing the text entered to the data type set in your derived class, comparing the text to a list of values, or verifying the text to be within a range of values.

para.span: 在重写此方法在派生类中的，请确保此方法以验证数字显示框的文本中添加代码。

span.span: When overriding this method in a derived class, be sure to add code in this method to validate the text of the spin box.

para.span: 如果将调用此方法属性设置为时属性设置。

span.span: This method will be called if the property is set to when the property is set.
